website_summaries.verdict: Tops our list for providing enhanced hearing and reliable customer support in a comfortable device that is nearly undetectable in the ear.
pros: Fit is so comfortable that many customers forget they are wearing them
Clear sound quality is backed by lifetime tech support
cons: Sound can be tinny and background noises amplified if the settings aren't tuned precisely
If you have true hearing issues, this won't be as effective as a true hearing aid

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Although they are very interested in a positive outcome for all their users, these did not work for me. I will be sending them back. These are nothing more than in ear amplifiers. Too much back ground noise.Feedback when using the phone and feedback when sitting quietly listening to music while reading. A nice try and considering the price of "real" hearing aids I gladly gave these a real try. Just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Carter

customer_reviews.title: The Squeal
customer_reviews.text: Sound is very tin like which might be a factor with any hearing aid. These were my first encounter with hearing aids so I don't know. Conversations were easily drowned out by any background noise....seemed like the background was always more amplified than actual voices. Then there was the squealing that was intense and painful, really painful. I couldn't get the things out of my ears fast enough. I actually think these Eargos did some damage to my hearing abilities. Considering possible law suit against the company. My lawyer is all for it. Really sorry I believed in their massive advertising campaign.
customer_reviews.author: Karen C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I can hear the spring peepers again. Can’t think of a thing to not like
customer_reviews.author: Biri Fay

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these Eargo Neos. However, they lack basic features like auto volume control, squeal, ambient noise reduction. EVERYTHING is loud. A light wind sounds like a hurricane and and the background din in a restaurant resembles an angry mob. Yes, they are rechargeable, but you get four volume settings and no other controls. They are comfortable but after six weeks one aid has died completely. Guess what? Past the return date. Any way, if you're looking to simplify buying a hearing aid, don't spend $2300 on a unit that does the same things a a $500 unit does. These are sound amplifiers, NOT intelligent hearing aids. And I REALLY wanted them to work. Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: librariandad

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable, too much squealing interference, sound quality well below BTE units, charger broke.
customer_reviews.text: After 2 weeks, one of the charging connectors stopped working. Before that, it was almost impossible to hear/talk on cellphone due to squealing interference. Comfort, performance a durability fell well below my Starkey BTE aids. I was really hoping for these to work, but the number of problems after a few weeks made me conclude that these would need to go back for multiple repairs and they lacked the sound quality, had an intolerable amount of squealing interference, and were just not a trustworthy and sufficiently durable design to meet my requirements, so I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Peter D.

customer_reviews.title: Best hearing aids I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I had regular behind the ear, battery-powered hearing aids for years but they were expensive and I had to go to an audiologist every time. I heard about Eargo and found out that they were rechargeable and didn't force you to go through a doctor. These are simple, very comfortable, and better priced. I hear better with Eargo than any of my old hearing aids. I can hear people talking crisp and clear and background noise is not a problem with these. You can also call their support team and they are very helpful and knowledgeable. Much easier than going to an audiologist!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my mom. She liked them but they didn't quite fit her ear correctly and made her ears sore. In the process of returning now...
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jaggi

customer_reviews.title: Without a doubt, this is the best you can purchase....
customer_reviews.text: Eargo has 3 products. I have used their lower cost units for 2 years, and recently upgraded to to the Neo. They are without a doubt, the finest hearing aids I have ever used. It is so wonderful to not say "HUH?" on a constant basis. Neo is their top of the line unit and it's program can even be modified or adjusted by yourself from your own computer. But, you don't have to take my word for it. Just ask everyone around me how much they love my new hearing aids.......
customer_reviews.author: TERRYGSTANLEY

customer_reviews.title: that they were rechargeable
customer_reviews.text: they worked great but my ears have a ringing sound and it was still hard to make out words.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Brown

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: My husband could hear better on ones I gave 150. A piece for . I would like a refund but the window is closed. Save your money. I’m stuck with them, eargo won’t give me a refund because I bought them threw amazon and amazon won’t because it’s past 30 days. This is a lot of money. I’m not to happy .
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Just try them
customer_reviews.text: My husband has used for several months now. He wears them all the time so they must be working. At first he used the smaller tips but now wears the next size. I feel his quality of life has improved and he loves the charging aspect. Much better experience than the behind the ears and batteries. They have the newer neo hifi version now so I would look at getting them.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: They are invisible
customer_reviews.text: I cannot begin to tell you how much I love the Eargo hearing aids. They are completely invisible, so comfortable and I can hear everything now. My son helped me get these hearing aids and they are a God send. I can hear in any situation. I had to wear them for a couple of weeks to completely adjust to them, but now I hardly know they are there and no one else knows. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Truly an answer to a prayer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have never used a hearing aid before I spite of having difficulty hearing. I heard all devices were uncomfortable, had rebound sounds, we’re very expensive. Then I found out about EARGO - how comfortable, no rebound sound, and inexpensive. It’s all true!! Plus both Amazon and EARGO provides support and answers to questions whenever needed. I’ve had my EARGO for almost a month. I can hear well and comfortably. The EARGO are not visible, even with short hair. I often forget I have them on. They are truly an answer to a prayer!
customer_reviews.author: B in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Easiest Hearing Aids
customer_reviews.text: This is the 6th hearing aids I've tried and have finally found happiness. Eargos are the easiest to use: they don't interfere with my hairdo or sunglasses, which are always on and off.
customer_reviews.author: marcia coxhead

customer_reviews.title: Eargo customer support
customer_reviews.text: Bought my Eargo's on Amazon. Eargo gives excellent customer support with their audiologists
customer_reviews.author: Murphy157

customer_reviews.title: I love being able to hear!!
customer_reviews.text: They work great, wonderful to be able to hear again!!
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Quality and design
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and work really well. Customer support is excellent. They follow up to make sure everything is to your liking and if not will adjust and fix the problem. They follow up with email as well as phone calls. They want their customer to be fully satisfied. I had a issue with to much treble in the sound and they made an adjustment so that the sound is much better. I highly recommend the product and the company behind it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Barber

customer_reviews.title: Revolutionary...
customer_reviews.text: I'm an early user of all Eargo products (disclosure: I used to work at Eargo) and when Eargo Neo came out, I gave it a try (at this time, I no longer worked for Eargo). Eargo Neo is like a massive upgrade from all the previous products (Eargo, Eargo Plus, and Eargo Max) that enhances everything that was great about them, and resolves every little issue that customers have reported.
customer_reviews.author: Ardy

customer_reviews.title: Product Breaks Down Easily.
customer_reviews.text: Comfort level is great. Sound is above average, but a lot of "feedback" at the higher settings. My left device stopped working and I sent it in for repair. They sent me back a refurbished unit which broke within three months. Repeated the process and the refurbished stopped working again in 3/4 months. When I went to send the 3rd left unit back, Eargo told me I would have to pay for repairs ($350.00 or more) as I was out of warranty. Never had the left unit working for more than 6 months since I bought them and now they are making me pay? I guess there is a reason they do not have any extended warranty options.
customer_reviews.author: ChiBob

customer_reviews.title: They don't work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and they do not work. Don't be fooled by their ads.
customer_reviews.author: John K

customer_reviews.title: This did not work for me!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this unit now for a month , making all the adjustments recommended by Eargo. I got very minimal amplification of sound for about 2 hrs, then nothing at all! The unit is comfortable, but squeals if I try to put a phone to it or even my shoulder. I'm returning the unit today.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: they are not reliable
customer_reviews.text: they are not reliable they just stop working don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: wayne hufford

customer_reviews.title: Life expectancy is 12 months
customer_reviews.text: In slightly over one year my cargo 's totally failed. I called multiple times trying to get resolution, to no avail;. The customer service representatives followed the script, 'your product has passed the 1 year time line so all we can do is provide you with a new set, for the original purchase price. So be pre[ared to fork out over $2000.00 every 12 months for this product. Cant believe they are still in business.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Condy

customer_reviews.title: Better hearing equals more confidence!!!
customer_reviews.text: No flapping on ear- comfortable after 2 weeks- adjustable- professional advice any time- no batteries in my pocket- can hear my priest sermon now- better in restaurant surrounding- worth every penny!!! Hope it lasts !!! Better hearing better confidence!!!
customer_reviews.author: Costakis Neocleous

customer_reviews.title: Read before buying
customer_reviews.text: What Eargo says is true. They help. What they don’t tell you is that they are not repairable. I assume that during the warranty they just replace them. I have a non-working set but repair is not available. Most aids that cost this much are. They work well so consider them disposable, and for me that is not enough.
customer_reviews.author: Hosea McAdoo

customer_reviews.title: The answer to your hearing loss.
customer_reviews.text: Eargo hearing aid is for me. It fits in the canal hardly anyone knows it is there. Eargo is easy to control. and if you are looking for comfort this is the one. The value for the money is good. I recommend this product hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: A "fits most".......
customer_reviews.text: .....but works for few generic sound amplifier. Not an industry defined hearing aid. 65% of the price of a real hearing aid, 10%- the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Darthvagrant

customer_reviews.title: Now I can hear.
customer_reviews.text: Simply - I had a difficult time hearing. I purchased EARGO NEO and now I hear much better. Takes a little getting accustomed to the change. No problem.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT PICARD

customer_reviews.title: A tiny hearing aid with big features
customer_reviews.text: I am by nature a skeptic to the claims of manufacturers and promoters, I must say EARGO lives up to their claims. The hearing aid is slightly longer than the eraser on your average pencil, it is completely hidden when inserted so their is little or no chance of it being lost due to eye wear or hats accidentally bumping them out of place. It has 4 levels of amplification and has held a charge for 19 hours with plenty more to go. The charging equipment is 3" circumference can be connected to a wall charger or any USB port . This is impressive tiny hearing aid with outstanding capabilities
customer_reviews.author: Robert A Winkler

customer_reviews.title: Charging the hearing aids.
customer_reviews.text: I am having a problem with charging the Eargo hearing aids in the charger. I have no idea if they will be charged in the morning. I clean all contacts with a Alcohol prep to insure all contacts are very clean, but some mornings they are charged or one or both are not charged. Very frustrating! Has anyone else had this problem?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product great value
customer_reviews.text: I like that the volume is easy to change by tapping my ear and they are invisible in the ear canal. I was told by a competitor that Eargo wouldn’t work for me, but they were wrong. I can hear things I couldn’t hear before. I’m very pleased with Eargo.
customer_reviews.author: garold l storey

product_meta.title: EARGO Neo Hearing Aid - Virtually Invisible, Rechargeable, Professional-Grade Hearing Aid - Delivered to Your Doorstep - No in-Person Visit Needed
feature_bullets: MEDICAL GRADE HEARING AIDS WITHOUT THE DOCTOR'S OFFICE - Eargo hearing aids are FDA regulated, exempt Class I medical devices and arrive at your door in days, all without the expense or hassle of visits to the doctor's office

SAVE TIME AND MONEY - Eargos cost thousands of dollars less than comparable traditional hearing aids and don't require multiple visits to an audiologist. If you have mild to severe high-frequency hearing loss, Eargos can help you hear better in days, not weeks
MORE CONVENIENT - Work with Eargo's licensed hearing professionals from the comfort and convenience of your home to further customize and tune your Eargos to get the best sound for you
MORE COMFORTABLE - Eargo's are "open-fit", with patented Flexis that suspend the devices inside the ear canal allowing air to flow through for a more natural feel
VIRTUALLY INVISIBLE - Eargos fit completely inside the ear canal, eliminating the need for a bulky behind-the-ear piece, and making Eargos virtually invisible

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
